segment.source: How to Deploy the MBAM Client to Desktop or Laptop Computers
segment.target: How to Deploy the MBAM Client to Desktop or Laptop Computers

segment.source: The Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) Client enables administrators to enforce and monitor BitLocker drive encryption on computers in the enterprise.
segment.target: The Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) Client enables administrators to enforce and monitor BitLocker drive encryption on computers in the enterprise.

segment.source: The MBAM Client can be integrated into an organization by deploying the client through tools, such as Active Directory Domain Services or an enterprise software deployment tool such as Microsoft System Center 2012 Configuration Manager.
segment.target: The MBAM Client can be integrated into an organization by deploying the client through tools, such as Active Directory Domain Services or an enterprise software deployment tool such as Microsoft System Center 2012 Configuration Manager.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: To review the MBAM Client system requirements, see MBAM 1.0 Supported Configurations.
segment.target: To review the MBAM Client system requirements, see MBAM 1.0 Supported Configurations.

segment.source: To deploy the MBAM Client to desktop or laptop computers
segment.target: To deploy the MBAM Client to desktop or laptop computers

segment.source: Locate the MBAM Client installation files that are provided with the MBAM software.
segment.target: Locate the MBAM Client installation files that are provided with the MBAM software.

segment.source: Deploy the Windows Installer package to target computers by using Active Directory Domain Services or an enterprise software deployment tool, such as Microsoft System Center 2012 Configuration Manager.
segment.target: Deploy the Windows Installer package to target computers by using Active Directory Domain Services or an enterprise software deployment tool, such as Microsoft System Center 2012 Configuration Manager.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: You should not use Group Policy to deploy the Windows Installer package.
segment.target: You should not use Group Policy to deploy the Windows Installer package.

segment.source: Configure the distribution settings or Group Policy to run the MBAM Client installation file.
segment.target: Configure the distribution settings or Group Policy to run the MBAM Client installation file.

segment.source: After successful installation, the MBAM Client applies the Group Policy settings that are received from a domain controller to begin BitLocker encryption and management functions.
segment.target: After successful installation, the MBAM Client applies the Group Policy settings that are received from a domain controller to begin BitLocker encryption and management functions.

segment.source: For more information about MBAM Group Policy settings, see Planning for MBAM 1.0 Group Policy Requirements.
segment.target: For more information about MBAM Group Policy settings, see Planning for MBAM 1.0 Group Policy Requirements.

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: The MBAM Client will not start BitLocker encryption actions if a remote desktop protocol connection is active.
segment.target: The MBAM Client will not start BitLocker encryption actions if a remote desktop protocol connection is active.

segment.source: All remote console connections must be closed before BitLocker encryption will begin.
segment.target: All remote console connections must be closed before BitLocker encryption will begin.
